title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.60 - Action of board of directors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.60 - Action of board of directors

State Regulations

The board of directors of the mutual trust investment
company, in its discretion, may direct by resolution the termination of the
corporation. A copy of such resolution, certified by the secretary of the
mutual trust investment company, shall be transmitted to the superintendent
within two bank business days after it adoption. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.60

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
